parameters.instruments: Piano, Warm Strings, Acoustic Guitar, Lush Synth Pads, Gentle Electronic Percussion, Subtle Bass, Backing Vocals
parameters.emotional_arc: Tender verse → soaring chorus → emotional bridge climax → reflective outro

brief: Pop ballad song at ~72 BPM with expressive female lead; nostalgic/longing mood. Piano-led arrangement with warm strings, acoustic guitar, lush pads, gentle electronic percussion. Builds from intimate verse to soaring chorus, emotional bridge climax, reflective outro. (Lyrics created with ChatGPT 5).
prompt_text: A heartfelt pop ballad at 72 BPM with expressive female vocals, intimate yet powerful. Nostalgic, longing, and soul-stirring, inspired by Christina Aguilera’s ‘Hurt’. Piano chords lead the arrangement, joined by warm strings, acoustic guitar, lush synth pads, and soft backing harmonies. Gentle electronic percussion and subtle bass support the voice without overpowering it. The song evolves from a tender verse to a soaring chorus, reaching an emotional climax in the bridge before fading into a reflective, cinematic outro.
